Books.Name: Witcher
Books.Description: is a fantasy series of short stories and novels about the witcher
Geralt of Rivia. In Sapkowski's books, "witchers" are monster hunters who (with training and body modification)
develop supernatural abilities at a young age to battle deadly monsters. The books have been adapted into a film, a television series,
video games, and a graphic novel series.
